document_data.name: Phaeryl
document_data.race: [[Human]]This article makes the assumption Netherese mages were human.
document_data.History:
Phaeryl created [[Haunted House]] in [[Eveningstar]], presumably during the times of [[Netheril]].{{cite book/Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting|295}}

Lord [[Tessaril Winter]] told Shandril in {{yearlink|1357}} that Phaeryl was the creator of the Haunted House in Eveningstar after the latter explored it for a bit.
